# security/firejail

**Role Path**: `roles/security/firejail`

## Description
Tasks for security/firejail - Application Sandboxing

## Key Tasks
- Install Firejail
- Ensure Firejail profile directory exists
- Create local Firejail configuration directory
- Configure Firejail GPU Access (Globals)

## Default Variables
- `firejail_enable_gpu`
